alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 17 at 3:35PM HST until July 19 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR MAUI COUNTY FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT FROM MIDDAY TUESDAY THROUGH TUESDAY NIGHT... .Trade winds will become strong in advance of Tropical Storm Calvin. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 45 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
